thread.title: Cozy Coats in Every Color of the Rainbow
thread.title_full: Cozy Coats in Every Color of the Rainbow -- The Cut

author: Lori Keong
title: Cozy Coats in Every Color of the Rainbow
text:
View Slideshow
Winter coats in classic colors and styles might be more practical, but vibrant accents can go a long way in adding cheer to a cold and dreary day. We've rounded up 19 ways to combat the cold this season, and they're all equally as chic as they are functional. Click through to see a spectrum of warm and fuzzy options for winter ranging from springy pastels to jewel tones to menswear-inspired long coats.
BEGIN SLIDESHOW
